title: Chapter 80 - Journey to the Service Centre
body:
Chapter 80 - Journey to the Service Centre


“Oh right, what are your plans? Where are you heading to?” Even though they were out of the ninth district, they were still close to the seventh district which was considered dangerous. She had to try and get another ride.


“I don’t have anywhere I need to go at the moment, so I’m not in a hurry anywhere.” He glanced at her then, and after hesitating slightly said, “If you don’t mind, I’m willing to send you back to your quarters before leaving!”


“I’ll have to trouble you.” She had been waiting for that offer. “I won’t stand on ceremony, let’s go!”


“Yes!” He immediately brought her along. Senior must be injured, but knowing that I’d worry, she didn’t have the heart to tell me. She is indeed a noble person. “Senior, do you have anywhere you need to be?”


“Let me take a look!” Yao Si had no clue about his thoughts, so she just opened the map and pointed to the right corner. “Here… 1456 km from where we are now, so it should be about half an hour away.”


“That…” Zan Zichen stilled, his sword stopping as well.


“Why? Is it not convenient for you?”


“… No!” He shook his head. “It isn’t inconvenient, I’ll send you there right this moment.” He headed forward at high speed. Regardless of the situation, he had to send her there, even if…


Yao Si was confused but suppressed her curiosity.


Zan Zichen was an image of worry, even taking a wrong turn once. She asked if he wanted to stop since she could walk there herself, but he objected the idea instantly.


After about half an hour, they finally reached the third district, getting close to the destination on the map. At that moment, Zan Zichen hesitated slightly before asking, “Senior Si, are you heading to Shi Fang sect?”


Shi Fang sect? Yao Si stilled. She just wanted to head to the service centre located on the map to ask what exactly had happened. It’s actually a sect?


“I should… be,” she replied. Instantly, Zan Zichen’s face paled and his gaze flickered sideways. “What’s wrong? It isn’t convenient for you? Why not…”I’ll go myself, okay! You look like you’re about to faint!


He forced out a smile, but did not look straight at her. “It’s fine, we’re about to reach it. I’ll bring you over.”


Zan Zichen sped up, and soon they reached a gigantic stone wall. At the top of it were the words ‘Shi Fang’ in italics, and the optical computer indicated that they were at the right location.


“Senior, I’d like to thank you for your help once again.” He bowed deeply. “There’s some animosity between me and Shi Fang sect… It won’t be good for me to stay here any longer. I shall take my leave, take care senior.”


“Oh… Oh!” He is leaving just like that, I see. Yao Si waved her hand. “Take care, good bye!”


He nodded before flying away in a hurry. However, just as he was about to fly off, the ground started to glow, exposing a large drawing that was about a few meters wide. Something jumped out from it, hitting the person in mid-air.


Zan Zichen’s feet slipped, and he fell down.


Yao Si jumped, rushing over to help him up. “Are you all right?”


He kept silent, but just then, a rude shout came from the wall ahead.


“Who is it? How dare you trespass Shi Fang sect!”


With a deafening sound, the doors with the two big words split open, exposing a passageway.


The stone wall is actually an automated door!
